title: gamakanaLinam
sahitya:
gamaka naLinam kamazh  isai uruvE !               nimala sri krishnamaNi enum sunAdhamE !! (gamaka) 
anupallavi
amararum; aRavazhi; tandavarum uvanda                  samarasa uNarvUTTum sAmagAnam danil  piRanda (gamaka) 
caraNam
nAmagaLum nADum,nAraNan pOTRiDum,                  tEmadhura tamizh gAnamdanil negizhnda                   pAmaran enai Alum pAvaniyE !! umayE !!                    nImanam kanindenakkaruL sei tAyE (gamaka)
